Base.name: Sol's Story
Base.text: I’ve certainly got some funny stories… When I was about 10, I tried bringing my chair through a restaurant drive-thru. It worked too. They asked, “How may I help you?”, and they looked around, and all they saw was a hand! But my 10-year-old logic was, “There are cars on wheels, I'm on wheels… It's even the same number of wheels!”, I thought to myself.
